numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The topic is diversity in professional sports.
2. The graph shows the number of players who are people of color on various sports teams.
3. The graph shows the percentage of players on each team.
4. The graph also shows the number of people of color who are coaches of these teams.
5. The graph also shows the number of people of color who are managers of these teams.
6. Our group noticed a pattern in the graph.
7. People of color make up a high percentage of players on these sports teams.
8. People of color make up a small percentage of coaches and managers of these teams.
9. Our group is curious about the gray portion of each bar.
10. Our group asks which group makes up the gray portion of each bar.
11. Our group noticed a lack of players of color in the MLB.
12. Our group asks why the MLB has a lack of players of color.
13. The data collection process raises questions for our group.
14. Our group asks which specific teams were involved in the data.
15. Our group asks who gathered the data.
16. Our group wonders about a paycheck difference between coaches and players.
17. Our group asks what consequences exist if few people of color are coaches.
